sequences.name: Warm follow-up (4 touches)
sequences.description: Simple warm follow-up sequence for someone who already knows you.

steps.bodyTemplate:
Hi {{firstName}} — just bumping this in case it got buried.

Totally flexible on timing. If it’s easier, feel free to suggest a couple windows that work for you.

Best,
{{senderName}}

Hi {{firstName}},

One more ping here. If now isn’t a good time, no worries — happy to reconnect later.

If helpful, here are two options: {{timeOption1}} or {{timeOption2}}.

Best,
{{senderName}}

Hi {{firstName}},

I’m going to close the loop for now. If/when you want to reconnect, I’m easy to reach.

Best,
{{senderName}}

sequences.name: Cold outreach (3 touches)
sequences.description: Short, respectful cold outreach with fast opt-out.

steps.bodyTemplate:
Hi {{firstName}},

Reaching out because {{reason}}.

If it’s relevant, I’d love to share {{valueProp}} and ask one quick question.

Open to a short {{callLengthMinutes}}-minute call next week?

Best,
{{senderName}}

PS: If I missed the mark, happy to drop it.

Hi {{firstName}},

Just following up. Should I talk to you or someone else on your team about {{topic}}?

Best,
{{senderName}}

Hi {{firstName}},

Last note from me — I know inboxes are busy. If it’s not a fit, no worries at all.

Best,
{{senderName}}
